text:
hello everyone! I am taking first steps using ruby gem for HubSpot. I have a problem right at set up time, if anyone mind sharing their knowledge:

```[6] pry(main)> require 'HubSpot-api-client'
=> false
[7] pry(main)> HubSpot::Client
NameError: uninitialized constant HubSpot::Client```

while require using just irb works ok
```irb(main):001:0> require 'HubSpot-api-client'
=> true```
:thinking_face:

Hi everyone, a quick question:
Is it still the case that Private Apps do not support Webhooks yet (as mentioned <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Webhooks-only-possible-on-Public-Apps/td-p/632680|here>)?

In case this is true, the only workaround, if Webhooks are need, is to create a public App that is not listened, correct?

Hey there everyone
Can anyone tell me how to create custom form from scratch ?
You might want to post this in <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> it's kinda a lot, especially depending on how you want to build it
What exactly are you trying to do? and follow up to that question, are you sure you can't do this with HubSpot forms already?

Hi, Can someone help me install an app (basic webhook to send CRM info to Celigo integrator) from my dev account (where it works well on tests) to my production account (with my HubSpot contacts, etc.)? I generate the url, but don't have a developer background and don't know how to get it installed. Probably because I don't have any background, I find the help files on this super confusing. Thank you in advance!
Hey <@U01QVR44MEY> thanks for your response, I am trying to build a 3 step form which is submitted only once.
